### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE students (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50),
grade VARCHAR(10),
age INT,
major VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE courses (course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
course_name VARCHAR(50),
instructor VARCHAR(50),
dept VARCHAR(50),
credits INT);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE students SET name='John Doe', grade='A', age=20 WHERE id=1;
